include_directories(../../3rdparty/spirv-tools/include/generated)
include_directories(../../3rdparty/spirv-tools/source)
include_directories(../../3rdparty/spirv-tools/external/SPIRV-Headers/include)
add_definitions(-D__STDC_LIMIT_MACROS)
add_definitions(-D__STDC_FORMAT_MACROS)
add_definitions(-D__STDC_CONSTANT_MACROS)

if (MSVC)
  add_compile_options(/wd4800)
endif()

add_library(spirv-opt STATIC ${source_list})
